title: 游戏启动脚本的问题
author: Grasscraft
txt_content:
启动脚本如下：
@echo off set appdata=D:\Minecraft\minecraft 软件\HMCL\.minecraft cd /D %appdata% "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_144 in\javaw.exe" "-Dminecraft.client.jar=D:\Minecraft\minecraft 软件\HMCL\.minecraft\versions\1.12\1.12.jar" -Dlog4j.configurationFile=C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\assets\log_configs\client-1.12.xml -Dminecraft.launcher.version=2.7.8.42 "-Dminecraft.launcher.brand=Hello Minecraft! Launcher" -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx512m "-Djava.library.path=D:\Minecraft\minecraft 软件\HMCL\.minecraft\versions\1.12\1.12-natives" -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true -Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true -cp "C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\com\mojang\patchy\1.1\patchy-1.1.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries\oshi-project\oshi-core\1.1\oshi-core-1.1.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\libraries

软件\HMCL\.minecraft\versions\1.12\1.12.jar" net.minecraft.client.main.Main --username Grasscraft --version "HMCL 2.7.8.42" --gameDir "D:\Minecraft\minecraft 软件\HMCL\.minecraft" --assetsDir C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\assets --assetIndex 1.12 --uuid f0880c6471d193210cecfe6d045cb422 --accessToken f0880c6471d193210cecfe6d045cb422 --userType Legacy --versionType "HMCL 2.7.8.42" --height 480 --width 854
这是我随便在HMCL里弄的一丢启动脚本
就是set appdata=D:\Minecraft\minecraft 软件\HMCL\.minecraft，是否与底下的文件目录文本有关系，也就是说上面置个目录，后面只要给出一个文件路径，如：libraries\org\apache\httpcomponents\httpcore\4.3.2\httpcore-4.3.2.jar，让置的目录+刚刚给出的目录就可以形成完整的文件路径，还是没有关系.
